subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Jason Kidd had 11 assists — 6 in the final 6 minutes 5 seconds — as the Mavericks sent the Wizards to their sixth straight loss, 97-86, on Sunday night in Washington.
snippet: Jason Kidd had 11 assists — 6 in the final 6 minutes 5 seconds — as the Mavericks sent the Wizards to their sixth straight loss, 97-86, on Sunday night in Washington.
